rows.label: tlk41310141_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I was being targeted by Superbia when
Vandham-san took me in.

rows.label: tlk41310141_02_msg0002
rows.name:
This Hræsvelgr Merc Group is known worldwide for
lending out Drivers, so there are almost no
countries hostile to us.

rows.label: tlk41310141_02_msg0003
rows.name:
The reason I can work as a mercenary
is thanks to Vandham-san, you know?

rows.label: tlk41310141_02_msg0004
rows.name:
And yet—
I haven't even finished repaying the kindness I received—
